program.title: Training Paradigm Code - Antonio Paolini"s 2008 third-year research group

constant.name: Def_IsTraining
constant.summary: 1 if this is training (in which case, aversion and dual-lever disabled by default), 0 if not (in which case constant defaults used)

constant.name: Def_MismatchLever
constant.summary: Default which lever is correct for a match (Left=0 Right=1)

constant.name: Def_MaxDuration
constant.summary: Default maximum duration (in minutes) for program to run

constant.name: Abs_MaxTrials
constant.summary: Limit on maximum number of trials to be recorded/processed

constant.name: Def_CorrectTrialsBeforeAversion
constant.summary: Default number of successful trials before shocks will begin being delivered for incorrect responses; -1 (< 0) means never shock)

constant.name: Def_AllowedResponseDelay
constant.summary: Default time (in s) between stimulus presentation and aversion if no animal response

constant.name: Def_InterToneDelay
constant.summary: Default Time (in ms) between presentation of first and second tones

constant.name: Def_PreToneDelay
constant.summary: Default Time (in ms) between starting lever trigger and first tone presentation.

constant.name: Def_CorrectTrialsBeforeDual
constant.summary: Default correct trials before dual-lever trial. -1 (<0) means only ever extend correct lever

option.name: MatchLever_Left
option.summary: Left lever is correct for match

option.name: MatchLever_Right
option.summary: Right lever is correct for match

column.name: G_MatchLever
column.summary: Which lever is correct for a match (Left=0 Right=1)

column.name: C_MaxDuration
column.summary: Maximum time before automatic termination (minutes)

column.name: G_CorrectTrialsBeforeAversion
column.summary: Number of successful trials before shocks will begin being delivered for incorrect responses; -1 (< 0) means never shock)

column.name: G_AllowedResponseDelaySec
column.summary: Time (in s) between stimulus presentation and aversion if no animal response

column.name: G_AllowedResponseDelay
column.summary: Time (in ms) between stimulus presentation and aversion if no animal response

column.name: G_InterToneDelay
column.summary: Time (in ms) between presentation of first and second tones

column.name: G_InterToneDelaySec
column.summary: Time (in s) between presentation of first and second tones. Autogenerated.

column.name: G_PreToneDelay
column.summary: Time (in ms) between starting lever trigger and first tone presentation.

column.name: G_PreToneDelaySec
column.summary: Time (in s) between starting lever trigger and first tone presentation. Autogenerated.

column.name: G_IncorrectShockDurationSec
column.summary: Time (in s) between starting lever trigger and first tone presentation. Autogenerated.

column.name: G_CorrectTrialsBeforeDual
column.summary: Default correct trials before dual-lever trial. -1 (<0) means only ever extend correct lever

column.name: G_SndBurstDurationSec
column.summary: Duration of sound burst in s

column.name: G_CamUnconnectedState
column.summary: Used to store 'Unconnected' StateID of camera

column.name: G_CamConnectOkState
column.summary: Used to store 'Ok' StateID of camera

column.name: G_CamConnectFailState
column.summary: Used to store 'Fail' StateID of camera

column.name: G_LeverExtensionStatus
column.summary: Lever-extension status

column.name: G_CorrectLever
column.summary: 'Correct' retractable lever to press

column.name: G_MatchOrMismatch
column.summary: Whether trial is a match or mismatch trial

column.name: G_CorrectOrIncorrect
column.summary: Whether response was correct or incorrect

column.name: G_UltrasonicIndexOffset
column.summary: Array offset for ultrasonic time recording

column.name: G_USSequentialReadingA
column.summary: Number of sequential ultrasonic detections A

column.name: G_USEventIndexA
column.summary: Index of current event for ultrasonic A

column.name: G_USSequentialReadingB
column.summary: Number of sequential ultrasonic detections B

column.name: G_USEventIndexB
column.summary: Index of current event for ultrasonic B

column.name: C_MaxDurationMsec
column.summary: Maximum time before automatic termination in msec (autogenerated)

variable.name: G(^G_MatchLever)
variable.summary: Which is the 'correct' lever for a tone match

variable.name: G(^G_CorrectTrialsBeforeAversion)
variable.summary: Number of correct-response trials before 'aversion' applied for errors

variable.name: G(^G_AllowedResponseDelay)
variable.summary: Time (in s) between stimulus presentation and aversion if no animal response

variable.name: G(^G_InterToneDelay)
variable.summary: Time (in ms) between presentation of first and second tones

variable.name: G(^G_PreToneDelay)
variable.summary: Time (in ms) between starting lever trigger and first tone presentation

variable.name: G(^G_CorrectTrialsBeforeDual)
variable.summary: Number of correct-response trials before both levers presented

input.name: Inp_HeadEntry
input.summary: Input ID of the head entry unit on pellet dispenser

input.name: Inp_LeverTrigger
input.summary: Input ID of the fixed lever 'starting' trigger

input.name: Inp_LeverInputLeft
input.summary: Input ID of retractable lever on the left

input.name: Inp_LeverInputRight
input.summary: Input ID of retractable lever on the right

input.name: Inp_UltrasonicA
input.summary: Input ID of ultrasonic input 1 of 2

input.name: Inp_UltrasonicB
input.summary: Input ID of ultrasonic input 2 of 2

output.name: Out_LeftLeverRetract
output.summary: Output trigger to extend/retract left lever
output.use: Toggle extended state of lever; OFF->Not extended, ON->Extended

output.name: Out_RightLeverRetract
output.summary: Output trigger to extend/retract right lever
output.use: Toggle extended state of lever; OFF->Not extended, ON->Extended

output.name: Out_LickShockSwitch
output.summary: Output ID of ENV-250A Contact Lickometer switching unit.
output.use: OFF->Lickometer active, ON->Floor connected to shock emitter

output.name: Out_Ultrasonic
output.summary: Output ID of ultrasonic recording unit.

output.name: Out_ShockEmitter
output.use: Toggle shock delivery: OFF->No shock presently being delivered, ON->CONTINUOUS SHOCK PRESENTLY BEING DELIVERED

output.name: Out_HouseLightRear
output.summary: Output ID of rear-most house light.

output.name: Out_HouseLightMid
output.summary: Output ID of miidle house light.

output.name: Out_HouseLightFront
output.summary: Output ID of front-most house light.

constant.name: Snd_SPIncrement (not in use)
constant.summary: Size of increment in sound pressure (in dB)

constant.name: Snd_FreqIncrement
constant.summary: Size of increment in sound frequency (in Hz)

constant.name: Snd_ToneBurstDuration
constant.summary: Duration of the burst of sound (in ms)

constant.name: Snd_InterBurstDuration
constant.summary: Duration of pause between sound bursts (in ms)

constant.name: Snd_SP
constant.summary: Sound pressure at which to present tones (in dB)

constant.name: Snd_RiseFallTime
constant.summary: Rise/Fall time (in ms)

constant.name: Snd_PreToneDelay
constant.summary: Delay between trigger and first tone presentation (in ms)

constant.name: Shk_IncorrectShockDuration
constant.summary: Duration of the electrical shock for an incorrect response (in ms)

constant.name: Lvr_RetractDelay
constant.summary: Time (in s) to wait for levers to extend and retract

constant.name: KP_ExperimentEnd
constant.summary: Trigger the experiment to end

constant.name: ZP_StartTimer
constant.summary: Trigger the post-tone pre-press timer

constant.name: ZP_StopTimer
constant.summary: Stop the post-tone pre-press timer, and write the result to the data array

constant.name: ZP_ExtendBothLevers
constant.summary: Extend both retractable levers

constant.name: ZP_ExtendCorrectLever
constant.summary: Extend only the correct lever

constant.name: ZP_ExtendIncorrectLever
constant.summary: Extend only the incorrect lever (here for completeness - not actually used)

constant.name: ZP_RetractLevers
constant.summary: Rectract all levers

constant.name: ZP_TerminateExperiment
constant.summary: End the experiment - may be used if error occurrs

constant.name: ZP_StartVideoRec
constant.summary: Start video recording

constant.name: ZP_EndVideoRec
constant.summary: End video recording

constant.name: ZP_ExtendSipper
constant.summary: Trigger extend sipper; set S for max # of sips before retraction

constant.name: ZP_SipperLimitHit
constant.summary: Triggers when the sipper limit is hit; if S less than 0 then never triggered.

constant.name: ZP_RetractSipper
constant.summary: Trigger sipper retract, regardless of whether sipper limit hit

constant.name: ZP_ExperimentEnd
constant.summary: Trigged to end the experiment

column.name: J_CompletedTrials
column.summary: Total number of trials that have occurred so far

column.name: J_TotalMatchTrials
column.summary: Total number of trials that have occurred with matched frequency

column.name: J_TotalMismatchTrials
column.summary: Total number of trials that have occurred with unmatched frequency

column.name: J_CorrectMatchTrials
column.summary: Number of frequency-matched trials with correct response lever pressed

column.name: J_CorrectMismatchTrials
column.summary: Number of frequency-mismatched trials with correct response lever pressed

column.name: J_IncorrectMatchTrials
column.summary: Number of frequency-matched trials with incorrect response lever pressed

column.name: J_IncorrectMismatchTrials
column.summary: Number of frequency-mismatched trials with incorrect response lever pressed

column.name: J_NoResponseMatchTrials
column.summary: Number of frequency-matched trials with no response after initial lever press

column.name: J_NoResponseMismatchTrials
column.summary: Number of frequency-mismatched trials with no response after initial lever press

column.name: J_Lever1Press
column.summary: Total responses on lever 1

column.name: J_Lever2Press
column.summary: Total responses on lever 2

column.name: J_CurrentHours
column.summary: Hours since commencement (for H:M:S.MS)

column.name: J_CurrentMinutes
column.summary: Minutes since commencement (for H:M:S.MS)

column.name: J_CurrentSeconds
column.summary: Seconds since commencement (for H:M:S.MS)

column.name: J_CurrentMilliseconds
column.summary: Milliseconds since commencement (for H:M:S.MS)

column.name: J_LickTrials
column.summary: Number of rewarded trials where licks have been taken

column.name: K_TrialNumber
column.summary: Number of this trial

column.name: K_TrialTimeHour
column.summary: Time post-commencement (H) this trial occurred

column.name: K_TrialTimeMinute
column.summary: Time post-commencement (M) this trial occurred

column.name: K_TrialTimeSecond
column.summary: Time post-commencement (S) this trial occurred

column.name: K_TrialTimeMillisecond
column.summary: Time post-commencement (MS) this trial occurred

column.name: K_TrialMsec
column.summary: Time post-commencement (msec) this trial occurred TOTAL - Not related to H:M:S

column.name: K_Frequency1
column.summary: Frequency of first tone presented

column.name: K_Frequency2
column.summary: Frequency of second tone presented

column.name: K_SP1
column.summary: Sound Pressure of first tone presented (not in use)

column.name: K_SP2
column.summary: Sound Pressure of second tone presented (not in use)

column.name: K_Response
column.summary: Trinary of validity of response: 0 = no response, 1 = incorrect, 2 = correct.

column.name: K_ResponseDelay
column.summary: Time taken to respond (up to maximum time) in 10-ms blocks.

column.name: K_LickCount
column.summary: Number of licks taken

column.name: K_FirstLickDelay
column.summary: Time (in msec) before first lick; -1 = NA

constant.name: K_TrialIndexMultiplier
constant.summary: Multiplier to be used for each trial

column.name: H_StartHour
column.summary: Hour of this event starting

column.name: H_StartMinute
column.summary: Minute of this event starting

column.name: H_StartSecond
column.summary: Second of this event starting

column.name: H_StartMillisecond
column.summary: Millisecond of this event starting

column.name: H_StartMsec
column.summary: Absolute milliseconds of this event starting

column.name: H_EndHour
column.summary: Hour of this event ending

column.name: H_EndMinute
column.summary: Minute of this event ending

column.name: H_EndSecond
column.summary: Second of this event ending

column.name: H_EndMillisecond
column.summary: Millisecond of this event ending

column.name: H_EndMsec
column.summary: Absolute milliseconds of this event ending

column.name: H_Band
column.summary: Which band led to the trigger

constant.name: H_IndexMultiplier
constant.summary: Multiplier to be used for each signal

array.name: D
array.summary: List of first-tone frequency of pairs to be tested, generated pre-start from supplied list of frequencies

column.name: DE_ToneFrequency
column.summary: Tone frequency being presented first in the pair

array.name: E
array.summary: List of second-tone frequency of pairs to be tested, generated pre-start from supplied list of frequencies

column.name: DE_ToneFrequency
column.summary: Tone frequency being presented second in the pair

array.name: F
array.summary: Integer list (0x0-32x32) representing available tone combinations - used with RANDD to step through tone combinations randomly

column.name: F_ToneConfigNumber
column.summary: Tone Configuration Number

array.name: I
array.summary: Integer list representing reward Z-values for reward delivery

list.name: Z
list.summary: List of frequencies available to test

option.name: ^G_CorrectLever_Unset
option.summary: 'Unset' state - if found in comparison, a problem has occurred

enum.name: G_MatchOrMismatch
enum.summary: Whether trial is a match or mismatch trial

option.name: ^G_MatchOrMismatch_Unset
option.summary: 'Unset' state - if found in comparison, a problem has occurred

option.name: ^G_MatchOrMismatch_Match
option.summary: The two presented tones are a match

option.name: ^G_MatchOrMismatch_Mismatch
option.summary: The two presented tones are a mismatch

enum.name: G_CorrectOrIncorrect
enum.summary: Whether response was correct or incorrect

option.name: ^G_CorrectOrIncorrect_Unset
option.summary: 'Unset' state - if found in comparison, a problem has occurred

variable.name: S
variable.summary: Number of sips remaining before sipper retract - set before using ZP_ExtendSipper

variable.name: T
variable.summary: Index of frequency pair to be used

variable.name: U
variable.summary: ID for reward to be given

variable.name: V
variable.summary: Temporary store for shuffling data to sound processor

stateset.summary: Run the preparation and termination functions of the program

state.summary: Set variables to default values
Generate the arrays of all possible tone combinations (D, E) which can be randomly selected from during tests.
Generate the arrays of all possible tone combinations (D, E) which can be randomly selected from during tests.
Pause until start command is issued; then convert used-data from ms to sec where required and continue. Presumably variables are set when start is triggered.
Wait for program termination
Turn off all outputs, save data and end
Wait for the start trigger
Wait for lever 1 press, then identify correct/incorrect levers and move to present tones
Trigger extension of the retractable lever
Delay for lever extension
Pause for pre-delay then play first sound
Pause for inter-tone delay then play second sound
Wait the duration of the tone, then start timer and commence test
Wait for lever press. Reset/Aversion if takes too long.
Process aversion - If enough trials, switch aversion on, otherwise just update data and reset
Switch aversion off and reset
Give reward
Retract water unit
Switch off pellet unit (reset for next use)
Update trial data
Write trial summary data. Reset variables. Check if experiment is complete - if so, issue termination command
Wait for a Z-pulse ^ZP_StartTimer
Run a timer in 10msec blocks until Z-pulse ^ZP_StopTimer received. Then reset to S1.

stateset.summary: Operate the lever extension and retraction

state.summary: Wait for a lever-relevant Z-pulse
Extend both levers, then jump to await retraction.
Extend correct lever, then jump to await retraction.
Extend incorrect lever, then jump to await retraction.
Wait for trigger, then retract all levers, then reset to 'no lever out' state.

stateset.summary: Timer - counts up in msec (in steps of 10 msec)

state.summary: Wait for start trigger
Increment counter, hour, minutes, seconds, milliseconds

stateset.summary: Camera management - connect to camera system and start/stop video

state.summary: Set constants for video connection state
Wait for video commands
Wait for start signal
Wait for an ultrasonic signal; 2 sequential readings of ultrasonic sound are required - otherwise counted as a 'glitch'
Wait until no ultrasonic signal for 20ms, then reset to 'no-ultrasonic' state
Wait for start signal
Wait for an ultrasonic signal; 2 sequential readings of ultrasonic sound are required - otherwise counted as a 'glitch'
Wait until no ultrasonic signal for 20ms, then reset to 'no-ultrasonic' state
Wait for sipper extend (ZP_ExtendSipper) to be triggered
Extend sipper until ZP_RetractSipper occurs
Extend sipper until ZP_RetractSipper occurs or max sips hit

stateset.summary: Count sips and add to each trial

state.summary: Wait for sipper extend (ZP_ExtendSipper) to be triggered
Count number of sips until retraction occurs or sipper limit hit

stateset.summary: Experiment timer - check if experiment has reached maximum duration

state.summary: Wait for start trigger
Every cycle, check if max duration of experiment reached
Trigger a ZP_ExperimentEnd every 10ms - this will make sure that everything receives it even
